hero.title: Professional Renewable Energy Solutions Provider
hero.subtitle: Specializing in the design, production and installation of EV charging stations and integrated energy systems

about.title: About Us
about.content: We focus on the production, distribution and engineering solutions of renewable energy products. Provide wholesale EV charging station sales and comprehensive energy system construction and maintenance services.
about.contentEn: Our company specializes in the production and distribution of renewable energy products. We provide engineering solutions and platform integration while offering wholesale charging station sales and comprehensive energy system construction and maintenance services.
awards: 2022 Shenzhen Science and Technology Innovation Commission - High-tech Enterprise Certificate
2022 Occupational Health and Safety Management System Certification
2020 Smart Light Pole Industry Alliance - Council Member
2019 China Charging Pile Association - Council Member

experience.title: Project Experience
experience.subtitle: Our charging stations have been successfully deployed in many cities across the country

projects.name: Shanghai Wanda New Energy Park Charging Station
Wuhan Greenland Center Parking Lot Charging Station

team.title: Our Team
team.intro: Our strength lies in our diverse and dedicated team of professionals. Each member brings unique expertise in renewable energy, engineering, and project management, working collaboratively to drive innovation and excellence. We are committed to fostering a culture of teamwork and continuous improvement to ensure we deliver the best solutions to our clients and contribute to a sustainable future.
team.introEn: Our strength lies in our diverse and dedicated team of professionals. Each member brings unique expertise in renewable energy, engineering, and project management, working collaboratively to drive innovation and excellence.
